feed.title: Archive RnE
feed.subtitle: 开擺すればいいんだよ

div.p: Decrypting Mach-O images protected by FairPlay DRM for security research purposes. C implementation with MobileSubstrate-based injection method.

entry.title: New article about latest QMK for BSSK R1

div.p: Porting the latest QMK firmware to the IBM Beam Spring Space Saver keyboard, bypassing Vial’s limitations and unlocking advanced features.

entry.title: Updated article on Emacs configuration after refactoring

div.p: After refactoring, the configuration is further flattened. Parts are separated, especially the prelude and the actual management of packages. Another notable update is on the mode line.

entry.title: New article which documents my Emacs configuration

div.p: Emacs configuration designed specifically for the NeXTStep Cocoa implementation, focusing on simplicity, avoiding complex abstractions, while incorporating a few handy patches.
Updated MathJax to version 4.0 beta for linebreak and math font support for the SVG output backend and correct bounding box for BussProofs.
Since I’ve learnt more about type theory, I’m updating some of the entries (aka, holes).

entry.title: New chapter about type dependent on terms

div.p: The new chapter for Type Theory and Formal Proof is about type dependent on terms, also known as dependent types, an overlapping feature of type theory and type systems.

entry.title: New chapter about type dependent on types

div.p: The new chapter for Type Theory and Formal Proof is about type dependent on types, which provides a way to construct generalized types.

entry.title: New chapter about second order lambda calculus

div.p: The new chapter for Type Theory and Formal Proof is about second order lambda calculus, which extends simply typed lambda calculus by allowing types to be functions that can take other types as arguments and return types as results.

entry.title: HTML mirror established and feature LdBeth

div.p: Mirror site which serves HTML5 instead of RsML is now available, hosting service provided by CloudFlare. Also specially feature LdBeth’s homepage.

entry.title: New chapter about simply typed lambda calculus

div.p: The new chapter for Type Theory and Formal Proof is about simply typed lambda calculus, a variant of lambda calculus where each term is assigned a specific type.

entry.title: New article about my minified TeX distribution

div.p: Article about my plainTeX distribution built on top of Web2C and LuaTeX, which entire installation is less than 20mb.

entry.title: New article about installing assembled ML/I on M3

div.p: Article about assembling ML/I on Apple silicon using the LOWL to LLVM map available. A short one.

entry.title: New article about gentoo system boot using EFI stub

div.p: Article about a modern system booting practice by leveraging the EFI system partition to directly load the kernel, a fast, clean, and robust approach.

entry.title: New chapter about untyped lambda calculus

div.p: The first chapter for Type Theory and Formal Proof presents a formal system for expressing computation based on function abstraction and application, where all functions and variables are treated as untyped.
